body.name: The Heiress in Disguise: A Historical Regency Romance Novel

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #5,980 in Kindle Store (See Top 100 in Kindle Store) #40 in Historical Regency Fiction #57 in Victorian Historical Romance (Kindle Store) #99 in Regency Historical Romance

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What happens when you are orphaned
reviews.reviewText: Angelique is a young girl, an only child, living in luxury when the unthinkable happens and she is orphaned. Her Aunt, Uncle and their three children move into her family home, but is wasn't for her good or take care of her. Her Aunt and Uncle believe they can do whatever they want with her money and force her to be a servant in her own home.Antoine lived next to Angelique when they were children and he moved back into the house next door to find out what had happened to her.A great read full of drama, sorrow and a rude awakening!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Angelique and Antoine
reviews.reviewText: Truly a magical tale. I thoroughly enjoyed it. there was even a fairy godmother. And I was so angry at her family that it made the HEA even sweeter. Thanks, Eliza

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A charming story
reviews.reviewText: Orphaned at a young age and then made a servant by her Aunt and Uncle, Angelique manages to stay happy. The truth does come out finally.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Stand alone clean Regency romance novel. Family stole Angelique’s identity. Her aunt and uncle with their three children moved into Somerset Manor from envy, not grief or desire to take care of her. People believe Angelique’s family to say she is missing because of the amount of control her aunt’s family have over her life. When Angelique is 22 years old she is basically a servant in her childhood home that she took over more and more work load as other servants are dismissed. The family is no longer able to say her correct name only call her Ella. When confronted by cousin, Marcus about her drab clothes Angelique’s statement “I always feel that anyone who has to rely on fine clothes in order to feel happy has a barren soul”.Antoine is an adored childhood friend that moved to France when his family sold their estate, although he felt guilt about letting time and distance come between their connections. He returns to London to learn if he can find her again. Family goes to London for a season that their eldest daughter, Gwyneth could develop a match. Younger daughter, Grace is despised by her mother almost as much as Angelique herself. Antoine returns to London, although he must use caution to discover and uncover the wrongs committed against Angelique. Twist and turns throughout this entertaining story.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful clean Cinderella story. They took everything from Angelique, but they couldn't take her goodness and kindness from her. I can't wait to read Grace story.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I loved the mystery in this story.
reviews.reviewText: The twist and turns of secrets and mystery was well written is this story. I think anyone would like reading it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really enjoyed reading this novel it is a great book to read

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Cinderella storyline
reviews.reviewText: This was a story of a young privileged woman that becomes orphaned and lives with an aunt and uncle who make her into a servant. But a childhood friend returns and finds out what happened and is determined to help her. But along the way there are twists that happen! I voluntarily reviewed an Advance Reader Copy of this book.
